description: This file defines a Flutter widget named ControlBar that provides UI controls for a game, including toggle sound effects, undo, and restart actions. It interacts with GameProvider to manage game state and uses Flutter widgets for layout and styling.

classes.name: ControlBar
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that provides UI buttons for sound toggle, undo, and restart, reacting to game state through provider.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ControlBar, including Tooltip, IconButton, OutlinedButton, and ElevatedButton, wired to game provider actions.
